page.title: 19Clubs and organisations
page.content: In this grid those clubs etc. which meet are based on Coads Green village either using the chapel,village hall or school.Chapel activities will be listed separately. They are Womens Institute,Youth Club, Coads Green Amateur Dramatic Soc., C.Gr.Fanciers(birds),Shell group (jnr youth club),C.Gr.Sch.Parent Teacher Assocation. The W.I. was reformed in 1961.The present membership is 40 and has members aged 21-80 paying a sub of Â£4. The members in 1985 restored the old village pump site. The Coads Green Social Centre Committee also organise activities in the village notably the annual 'Hay Day' which contributes to the hall's upkeep.The hall has featured in local communty news as an outstanding centre.
